Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, clean rooms, good value”
Reviews.Author: IMNTTRAVEL
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for one night during our father's hospital stay. We were tired and relieved to find a hotel with friendly staff and clean rooms. They also offer a discount rate for "hospital" stays. I called around and the staff was by far the most helpful and friendly in the area...something you area looking for when you are tired at the end of a long day. Although we were not here for leisure, I would stay at this hotel again for any reason.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth $500 a night!”
Reviews.Author: PutMeOnABeach2011
Reviews.Content: We found out last minute we has tickets to the super bowl, so to say finding an available hotel was difficult is an understatement. However we were able to find rooms at the Jameson Inn Indy South, and based on the reviews we felt pretty lucky! The location is really great; you're not in downtown Indy but its close, and there are lots of shopping options, food, etc. When we walked in the room, there definitely wasn't anything special About it, but we knew we had a place to lay our heads and that's all we needed. However the second I took my shoes off, it was clear that they had not swept the floor because I was stepping on something that we did not bring in with us. Gross. We also got a room right by the interstate, so sleep quality was not the best. However the curtains block out all light and we were able to sleep in; loved that! The shower does have little cubbies for you to place your shampoo/conditioner in, which was very helpful! AWFUL towels. Bring your own (I'm kidding, but they really are bad). It's our last night; we just walked in, and they only cleaned a 1/4 of our room. We had two beds; one was made, the other wasn't. And my bed has the old pillow cases; I can tell because there's still mascara on the pillow from the night before. Really? Is it too much to ask to get new sheets? Especially since all the bars here allow smoking in them so everything we own smells like smoke. Listen, it was a GREAT location and like I said, we just needed a place to sleep. But it was not worth the $500 a night they charged us because it was the super bowl (total rip off) and we will not be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, good facilities”
Reviews.Author: Adrian C
Reviews.Content: I just spent last week at a local woodworking school. The Jameson was close to the school, local shops and loads of restaurants. The service was great and I especially was grateful to see laundry facilities in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good pet friendly hotel.”
Reviews.Author: BigTool
Reviews.Content: When passing through Indy we normally stay at another nearby hotel but the rates at that other hotel went up significantly- - so I decided to try the Jameson Inn. We stayed at a different Jameson property earlier this year, and liked it a lot. This hotel did not disappoint. We were very happy with our decision to try someplace new. Things started well with a very friendly evening clerk (Raquel?) who put us in a room that matched my reservation request exactly. The room had a pleasant up-to-date decor, for a hotel in this price range. Everything in the room worked and the bed was comfortable.The only shortcoming was the breakfast buffet. It was average, at best. Thankfully, Long's Bakery is about 1 mile down Southport Road.

Reviews.Title: “Great, but limited breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Andy O
Reviews.Content: From the friendly check-in man to the cleanliness and size of the room to the interesting location, I was very pleased with this Jameson Inn as a final stopover before coming home from a recent road trip. The room was nice, with a standard television - nothing too fancy, and while it didn't get a few cable channels I'm used to at home, it interestingly got TV Japan - and mini-fridge and freezer and a pleasant arrangement of basic furnishings. The aforementioned check-in man seemed genuinely willing to assist us in finding somewhere to go for dinner for our one night there, and to that end, gave us a 10%-off coupon for the Cheeseburger In Paradise down the road. I would certainly stay here again, especially when traveling with a pet, as my family did during this trip; the fee for a small dog is only fifteen dollars. My only issue of concern was the breakfast, which seemed to be very limited; for that, I'd probably go to the nearby Bob Evans or Waffle House.

Reviews.Title: “probably not”
Reviews.Author: Seafarer450
Reviews.Content: Hotel was okay. Breakfast bar had benn cut back severely. Fewer pastries, no bananas,no yogurt. Ate breakfast at other restaurants.Breakfast included is part of the reason we stay at that particular Jamesons year after year.

Reviews.Title: “Good stay except for leaky bathtub faucet”
Reviews.Author: KYtravelman39604
Reviews.Content: I had stayed at this hotel a couple of years ago and felt it was a convenient and clean place to stay. It is located right off I-65 and is easy to find. I was very impressed with the friendliness of the front desk staff. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. However, after I took a bath, the faucet leaked all night which was a bit annoying when trying to sleep. I reported it to the front desk when I checked out and was told they would take care of it. The breakfast was OK but very limited. A Cracker Barrel and Bob Evans are located nearby and would be a better bet for breakfast if you're really hungry.

Reviews.Title: “Well maintained property”
Reviews.Author: damare
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent two nights at this hotel in separate visits on May 1 and May 6, 2010. Its location is at exit 103 on interstate I-65 just south of Indianapolis, IN. This exit has a generous number of motels and fast food restaurants for travelers. The property is well maintained with clean rooms, and a friendly and very helpful staff. Natalie Beavers, the general manager is very helpful. The hotel is close to the highway. I would suggest you ask for a room facing away from the two highways, and away from the dumpster. When we went to our room on arrival, it faced the interstate. I asked for a change of room which they did immediately and a staff member was at our room almost immediately to help with moving our luggage. Hot buffet breakfast was very good. All and all a very good stay for a traveler. We came back through the area on May 6 and stayed again. Things were not so rosy this time. This hotel chain is "pet friendly", meaning you can bring your dog or cat in the room for a small fee. The hotel chain has rules about size of pets and not leaving pets unattended in the room. I realize it is difficult for hotel management to control the behavior of some guests. A rude guest left their three dogs unattended in the room directly above us with the window open. One of the dogs was a large Labrador Retriever. Those dogs barked and howled at the window and the door for four to five hours until about 11:00PM.. Several guests complained to hotel management. Management tried to help but there was little they could do until the room occupants returned. Other similar rooms were not available. This one thing made our stay on May 6 very uncomfortable. Other than that I would rate the hotel as four stars. If you are unlucky enough to get a room near barking dogs, or facing the highway, two stars is generous. Averaging the two visits, I gave it three stars. This is a good quality and well managed motel but one or more rude guests can make a stay uncomfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible Value in Indianapolis”
Reviews.Author: Neptuno55
Reviews.Content: I have stayed in this roadside Hotel quite a few times when attending classes at nearby Marc Adams School of Woodworking. Because my stays are usually of 15 days, the cost has to be reasonable. This is really the best combination of price and quality in that area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Accomodations + Great Value = Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Weloveboating
Reviews.Content: We travel to Indiana frequently to visit family. Recently, we stayed at the Jameson for two nights. Check-in was efficient and pleasant. The rooms are spacious and are equipped with a microwave and fridge. The room also had a separate closet for hanging your clothes and storing your suitcase. Bathroom was spotless! The fitness center had new equipment (treadmill, elliptical, bike, weights), a flat screen TV and a rack with towels. My only complaint (and a minor one at that) would be that there wasn't any anti-bacterial spray to wipe down the equipment after use. In spite of its location (next to the freeway), the hotel was quiet . Also, it is within a 5 minute drive of the Mall, area restaurants and Starbucks :-) The hotel staff was very accomodating and was eager to assist with suggestions regarding local restaurants and stores. All in all, a great experience!

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: RJM72
Reviews.Content: I have been stay ay Jameson since August 2010 for 8 to 10 nights a month while I visit Indy. I travel approx 200 nights a year and the staff at the Jameson are very friendly and accomodating. There are many hotels in the Southport area to stay in but none as friendly as Jameson. By the way the hotel in itself is a nice place to stay. Keep up the good work Misty and company. You are the reason I stay there

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have been better”
Reviews.Author: joselouis058
Reviews.Content: Our stay was a tremendous experience. We had to find a location close to the south side of Indianpolis, during the week because of a household emergency. We had a water main froze during a sub-zero temperature spell in early February. Our hostess, Misty was a God send! She was helpful, professional and informative. She gave us an emergency rate. The accomodations were wonderful. Room was very clean. She offered us extra towels without asking. We've done a grat deal of traveling, apart from the unique circumstances surrounding this stay and we have never been treated better. This includes the times we've stayed at Disney resorts as well. I would highly recommend this particular Jameson Inn. The breakfast included, biscuits and Gravy and some of the best Waffles I've ever had. All the ammenities were fabulous. The service was exceptional. Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: “" Great Coustmer Service "”
Reviews.Author: ml85249
Reviews.Content: I have been saying in a Jameson Inn since Nov. 2, 2010 from Little Rock Ark. South Bend Ind. and the last month and a half at Jameson, Indy South. I own a Construction Company and have stayed in a lot of hotels and if I am in a city that has a Jameson Inn and Suites that is where I'll be. When I read the bad review that was posted on Feb. 8, I had to respond. Everyone that works at Indy South have been very nice to me and all my employee's, they all are professional and helpful, from from desk to maintiance staff. So when reading the review that called out MISTY... I am the contruction worker staying at the hotel!!!! MISTY Shushed you for a reason YOU WERE LOUD... Remember you are a guest at the hotel. You don't own it.. There are other people staying and trying to sleep. . Kuddo's to entire staff for doing a great job.

Reviews.Title: “Bad customer service”
Reviews.Author: Mec65
Reviews.Content: When me and my husband and sister in law and brother where checking in the girl at the front desk was very very rude and kept on shushing us saying their are construction workers sleeping and we were just checking in talking to her I was very very upset I will never stay again because of MISTY at the front desk I've stayed before because of traveling and she was rude then but thought maybe a bad day but how she was yesterday very unacceptable they lost business and for service like that 89 a room to much

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value Tripadvisor was right on”
Reviews.Author: czhv18a
Reviews.Content: Excel;lent value. This is walking distance to Cracker Barrel, has many outlets to plug things in, Quiet rooms, good service, a gym, and I noticed an outdoor pool (closed for the winter of course, but if someone is going in the summer would be nice), breakfast, and all for <$100 what is not to like?

Reviews.Title: “Nice, friendly and clean”
Reviews.Author: rmalino
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our 3 nights at the hotel. The people were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was the best that I have had in a long time. Recommend to all.

Reviews.Title: “Will definetly stay again if in this area or where another one is.”
Reviews.Author: frog0046
Reviews.Content: Found out about this hotel in the traveler's coupon book. Very nice hotel, spacious room with chair & ottoman & big L shaped desk. Very comfortable King bed. Breakfast included waffles, buscuits & gravy, cereal etc. Misty at the front desk was very helpful. We asked about a Goodwill close & she mapquested the directions for us. We will stay here again if in this area or in an area where another Jameson Inn is located.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED Jameson Inn!”
Reviews.Author: jeanne555
Reviews.Content: I was in the Indianapolis area for just one night and was looking for a nice hotel on a budget. After looking at all of the reviews on TripAdvisor I booked a night at Jameson Inn and loved everything about it! The room was large, VERY clean (and I am very picky on the cleanliness), extremely comfortable bed and pillows, and right by almost everything! Jameson Inn is my new favorite hotels to stay at and I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area! You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “The best Jameson Inn we've ever seen”
Reviews.Author: TravellerFlorenceSC
Reviews.Content: We were travelling to WI and stayed at Jameson Inn of Indy South overnight. The motel staff was exceptionally friendly and helpful. Misty helped us check in even thoug we didn't have a reservation. She gave us tips on where to eat and gave us discount coupons for a steak house. The room was very clean and comfortable. We try to stay at Jameson Inn's because they are consistently clean and comfortable, but this one was exceptional. The breakfast was good...fresh made waffles... Even though the motel is right off the interstate, there was no traffic noises. We were informed that there is a quiet ordinance for the hallways. No hallway noises...means a peaceful night sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Super Service from Misty”
Reviews.Author: workmanBurlington_Ia
Reviews.Content: When I called to make a reservation Misty was so helpful. When we arrived, she knew I was the person that called. She helped us with directions and gave us advice on where to eat. She did a super job and made the stay great. The hotel was clean, comfortable and had everything we needed. I would stay again and I will tel all of my friends, this is the place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, close to downtown”
Reviews.Author: julesfreak
Reviews.Content: This hotel was very clean and comfortable. We felt secure staying there with small children. The staff were all very friendly. Great free "continental" breakfast in the morning. Plus there is a Cracker Barrel next door, easy to walk to. Only about 15 minutes from downtown Indy, you can't beat the location and the price.

Reviews.Title: “Jameson Inn did a wonderful job making us feel at home!”
Reviews.Author: frugalmommie22
Reviews.Content: Long story, but ending up being wonderful. In April I reserved a hotel room at another hotel in South Indianapolis. We arrived to a disgusting experience at that hotel and quickly had to find another hotel. We didn't want to stay in such a dirty place. I called all the hotels in the area and when Natalie answered the phone for Jameson Inn, she was professional. I explained we were in a bind and needed a room for a week starting that day and that the hotel we were at was bad. She assured us she had a room with everything we wanted; microwave, refrigerator, internet and also a pool. We drive over there and we were SO IMPRESSED! The whole building was clean and polished. They had hot coffee right at the front desk all day. We got into our room. It was clean and nice. Microwave and refrigerator were both clean and looked up to date, not some run down old model. My co worker used the workout room and it also was clean. The whole week they were friendly and professional. The cleaning staff did an excellent job. The pool was clean. Everyone was SO friendly. Breakfast bar every morning had coffee, juice, milk. It has waffles, oatmeal, cereal, bagels, and muffins for breakfast. We really appreicate the service we recieved and for them being so nice about getting us a hotel room that was clean and comfortable and AFFORDABLE! Kudos to the two ladies at the desk who helped us Natalie and MIsty. Thank you Jameson Inn. We will use your hotel in our future travels!

Reviews.Title: “Wow! Glad I stopped!”
Reviews.Author: ssolo
Reviews.Content: It was 8:30 and I had about 4 more hours to drive--stop or keep going? I checked rates at the Hampton Inn ($109.00) and the Holiday Inn Express ($99.00) and had decided I may as well keep going, even if I got to my father's house after midnight. Noticed a Jameson Inn, and because I had had a good experience with them in the past, thought I'd try one more hotel, hoping it might be in the $70.00 range. Bingo. $79.99--or set your own rate--and I ended up with a very nice room for $60.00 plus tax. The clerk, Misty, was careful to choose a room toward the back, away from the interstate, and the room has a fridge, microwave, and extra outlets for my computer and cell phone. I will definitely be seeking out Jamesons in the future. Icing on the cake: I heard a kitten out front near my car and paused to see where it was--Misty came out and explained someone had dropped it off; she was feeding it and the manager was going to live trap it because it was too skittish to catch. How many people just ignore strays hoping they'll just "go away"?

Reviews.Title: “The Best”
Reviews.Author: lang510
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel with my daughter and each time it has been excellent. Since my daughter was participating in an athletic event, it was great that customer service could be flexible with their checkout times. They were amazing. A big thumbs up for Whitney for all her help, including directions to various places in the area. When it was time to go to bed, I don't remember anything. I hit that pillow and I was out. The beds were extremely comfortable and the hotel in general was very quiet even though it was almost full. I look forward to coming back to Indianapolis and staying at the Jameson Inn.

Reviews.Title: “This was my first time staying at Jameson Inn and I would definitely stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: IndianapolisHeather
Reviews.Content: I thought my room was very clean and the staff was very friendly; polite and helpful. I was impressed with how comfortable the beds were and that they served a hot breakfast. It was overall a great experience and I would recommend Jameson Inn to anyone and everyone I know!

Reviews.Title: “This is a very nice hotel with helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: nancygreensburgin
Reviews.Content: I really liked this hotel. It was very clean and comfortable. It is close to shopping and dining areas and is very convenient to interstate access.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: Publius2003
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here on a quick overnight after a flight into Indy. We booked this for dirt cheap on Priceline, and thought we got excellent value. This hotel is on par with a Baymont or Holiday Inn Express. The rooms are well furnished with comfy beds and refrigerators. It is clean and furnished with contemporary style. The bathroom is was clean with new fixtures. The breakfast was good as well, and it did have an internet terminal for guests. I liked our stay and would seek out this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service and Clean, Tastefully Decorated Rooms”
Reviews.Author: BettieBIndianapolis
Reviews.Content: My extended family stayed here overnight for a wedding in Greenwood. Everyone was pleased with the service, cleanliness, breakfast, and the helpfulness of the staff. I would definitely recommend this hotel and stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A Very Goodnight Sleep”
Reviews.Author: grannykelly08
Reviews.Content: our stay was very enjoyable we go often to jameson inn to get away from our kids .we enjoy the beds are very soft pillowtop beds very comfortable service is great friendly staff .breakfast is good too ! lots of choices of restraunts to choose from . cracker barrel texas roadhouse steak n shake kentucky fried chicken and many more come stay at jameson inn for a night or two you"ll agree they are the best hotel for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay for Races”
Reviews.Author: psupiller
Reviews.Content: Very good value, better than I expected! Within 20-25 minutes of Indianapolis Motor Speedway and other venues as well. Many good restaurants very close. Easy on and off I-69 and I-70. I go to at least three events yearly and have already reserved rooms for all of next year. Very clean, refrigerator and microwave in our room, decent breakfast every morning, better than average exercise facilities.

Reviews.Title: “Was Very Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: JHopk34243
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed there two nights, first night was not bad, it seemed clean, the bed was comfortable..the second night there was roaches, in the bathroom, by the bed.. we will not be going back..

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: NotLostJustExploring
Reviews.Content: After a bit of research I came up with this hotel for our post-flight stay after arriving late afternoon in Indianapolis. As everyone knows, trying to second-guess what an actual room/hotel will be like can be quite difficult based on pictures and online reviews. To say the least, we were delighted with this hotel. So much so, we cancelled pre-departure reservations at another hotel and booked that night here also. The hotel and rooms are spotless. The bed was nice and comfortable. Staff is non-intrusive, but courteous and attentive. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Precious Memories”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had not been priveleged to visit our son on his territory in years. We traveled from Tennessee to Indianapolis with anticipation to be with him but not sure as to where we would stay. Signature Inn had a nice ring to it's name and the price was very reasonable. We took a chance and wow! we were amazed at the awesome personal service and concern provided by the staff. They knew just when to clean and refresh our room. They didn't know how important our visit was but you would have thought they planned our little family gathering. One morning we were a little late for the motel furnished breakfast. The biscuits were all gone although gravy was still available. A marvellous young lady (Melissa Oburn) attending the desk alone took the time to cook our son biscuits. The atmosphere and kindness of the Signature Inn made our threesome reunion a lasting precious memory.

Reviews.Title: “Bugs in the bed!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We have never experienced anything like this before, bugs in the bed!!! We came home after staying at the Signature Inn at (4402 East Creek View Dr) Indianapolis, In, and noticed that we were itching with welts from bug bites. We called the hotel right away and was told by the clerk that a manager would call us back. That was 2 days ago, and never received a call. During our stay as well, we were out of some necessities and was informed that they did not have room service and we can come down and get them ourselves. I will not recommend this hotel to anyone of my friends.

HotelInfo.Name: Jameson Inn Indy South
HotelInfo.Address: 4402 East Creek View Road, Indianapolis, IN 46237
